description: Various internal and external alterations comprising: minor layout changes; replacement of kitchen, bathroom and WC fittings; installation of second floor ensuite bathroom; installation of under-floor heating to lower-ground and second floors; repair and adaptation of internal joinery fittings; installaton of new internal joinery; replacement of balcony components; replacement of rooflights; installation of 6 solar panels to flat roof.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans- 

Site Location Plan; Block Plan; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.00; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.01; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.02; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.03; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.04; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.05; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.06; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.07; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.08; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.09; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.10; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.11; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.12; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.13; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.14; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.15; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.16; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.17; 3_SHPII_A_P_10.18; SHPII_A_P_20; 23_SHPII_A_P_20.01; SHPII_AP_20.02; SHPII_AP_20.03; SHPII_AP_20.04; SHPII_AP_20.05; SHPII_AP_20.06; 23_SHPII_A_P_20.02.1 - Second-Floor Under Floor Heating Layout Plan; 23_SHPII_A_PD_10.08; 23_SHPII_A_PD_10.09; 23_SHPII_A_PD_10.10; 23_SHPII_A_PD_10.11; 23_SHPII_A_PD_10.12; 23_SHPII_A_PD_10.13; 23_SHPII_A_PD_10.14; 23_SHPII_A_PD_10. 23_SHPII_A_DE_20.07 - Photovoltaic Panels - Proposed Drawings @ 1:10 &1:50; 23_SHPII_A_E_10.01; 23_SHPII_A_E_20.01; 23_SHPII_A_E_20.02; 23_SHPII_A_E_20.03; 23_SHPII_A_E_20.04; 23_SHPII_A_E_20.05; 23_SHPII_A_E_20.06; 23_SHPII_A_GAD_10.01; 23_SHPII_A_GAD_10.02; 23_SHP II_A_PD_50.01.2 - Walk-On Skylight Detailed Drawings; 23_SHP II_A_PD_50.02 - Underfloor Heating Detailed Drawings; 23_SHP II_A_PD_50.03 - Roof Level Skylight Detailed Drawings; 23_SHP II_A_PD_50.04 - Proposed Lower-Ground Floor Glazed Staircase Screen Details; 23_SHPII_A_GA_10.00 - General Arrangement Drawings; 23_SHPII_A_GA_20.00 - General Arrangement Drawings; Photographs of Front Forecourt & Lightwell; Photograph of Tile Samples; Van Der Valk Solar Systems - Installation Manual; Design and Access & Heritage Statement Part 1; Design and Access & Heritage Statement Part 2.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 4 - No lights, meter boxes, flues, vents or pipes, and no telecommunications equipment, alarm boxes, television aerials, satellite dishes or rooftop 'mansafe' rails shall be fixed or installed on the external face of the buildings. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy CS14 of the London Borough of Camden Local Development Framework Core Strategy and policy D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the contents of the Design and Access & Heritage Statement Parts 1 and 2, this consent does not approve a metal-framed replacement lower-ground floor screen and door to the front elevation or the installation of an additional rooflight to the front section of the flat roof.

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
